column5: Brand new apartment with all the amenities. In the heart of the Heights with a private entrance, parking and a view from the trees. This modern and well furnished apartment provides a quiet retreat with everything you need for a weekend or longer. In-apartment laundry with fully furnished kitchen. Cruiser bikes available for exploring the Heights.  2 night min. Additional accommodation available in adjoining room with queen sleeper sofa and bathroom to accommodate 6 for additional $50/night.
